sentence: She wrote that, Im going to do everything in my power to protect the women of Florida and preserve freedom over our bodies including beating Ron DeSantis.? State Sen. Annette Taddeo, D-Miami, said the brunt of the ruling would be felt by women who cannot afford to cross state lines, the majority of them Black and Brown, to states that allow access to this medical care.?
